content: create fun scrappy-looking crochet arm warmers to dial up your winter wardrobe working straight from the ball using red heart all in one granny square creates a gorgeous scrappy effect in perfectly curated shades quick and easy to crochet the project is worked flat in double_crochet stitches with single_crochet in the back loop only ribbing at the top and bottom edges with 4 sizes to choose from it s a great way to add whimsical charm to any wardrobe materials red heart® all in one™ granny square™ 8 8 oz/250 g 417 yds/381 m hyper violet 2022 size s m l 1 1 1 ball finished length s m l xl 14½ 37 cm 15½ 39 5 cm 16½ 42 cm 18 46 cm
